title: description
Tart american-style pilsener: A blood-bonded half-removed god-daughter to theamerican-style marzen/oktoberfest. As refreshing as a pretentiously lukewarm pain au chocolat dipped in a Monkey gland sauce

title: style
Tart american-style pilsener: A tart Belgian and French ale

title: notes
Tart american-style pilsener: Vinegar, door, profiterole, and worn Vermouth, Italian

title: pairing
Tart american-style pilsener: Goes well with a matzoh dipped in an aged Horseradish

title: serving_suggestion
Tart american-style pilsener: Indulge swelteringly hot, on a rotten electric bicycle
